#include <iostream>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <string.h>

using namespace std;

int compare(const void *a, const void *b)
{
	return strcmp(*(char**)a, *(char**)b);
}

int main()
{
	int i, j, k, l, count=0;
	char **ch;
	int N;
	
	cin>>N;
	ch = (char**)malloc(N*sizeof(char*));
	for(i=0; i<N; i++)
	{
		*(ch+i) = (char*)malloc(100*sizeof(char));
		cin>>*(ch+i);
	}
	
	qsort(ch, N, sizeof(char*), compare);
	
	for(i=1; i<N; i++)
	{
		k=0;
		while(*(*(ch+i)+k) == *(*(ch+i-1)+k) && k<strlen(ch[i]) && k<strlen(ch[i-1]))
			k++;
		if(count<k)
			count = k;
	}
	cout<<count<<endl;
	return 0;
}
